title: T206 Blowout - Raw Mostly Auth With Amazing Eye Appeal Or Lower Grade
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: T206 Blowout - Raw Mostly Auth With Amazing Eye Appeal Or Lower Grade
posts.post_content:
McGraw - From a near set I purchased a couple of years ago that had over two hundred cards with clipped corners that were otherwise mostly in outstanding condition. Mugsy has the clipped corner...nice corners otherwise. Pencil mark in border by finger. Clean back. No creasing at all. $35

Chance - From a near set I purchased a couple of years ago that had over two hundred cards with clipped corners that were otherwise mostly in outstanding condition. Chance has the clipped corner. Card almost near mint otherwise. Beautiful eye appeal. Great centering. SOLD

Griffith - From a near set I purchased a couple of years ago that had over two hundred cards with clipped corners that were otherwise mostly in outstanding condition. Griffith has the clipped corner. Some creasing. Very red background. Seems like an extra red pass. SOLD

Willis - From a near set I purchased a couple of years ago that had over two hundred cards with clipped corners that were otherwise mostly in outstanding condition. Willis has the clipped corner. Card EX-MT otherwise. Beautiful eye appeal. $45

Barry - Very nearly a complete no-name card. Someone wrote name "Barry" in pencil along border due to the name almost not appearing on the card at all. Clipped corner. Otherwise near EX. $15

Killian - GD condition. Small stain top right corner. Back clean. No creases. $23

O'Brien - This card is a mess but it is absolutely HUGE. 1 or 2 mm larger than any other T206 I have owned. SOLD

All prices include shipping.

Tom C
